RecitationInstruction.ab: ńiuuaēδaiiemi haṇkāraiiemi ratauuō...] ratauuō mainiiauuaną̇m ratauuō gaēiϑiianą̇m OD gaoidaiiaheca narš aṣ̌aonō (VrS1.17) 2065; n. h. ratauuō mainiiauuaną̇m OD yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō (VrS1.18) 2070.

Commentary.ab: ratauuō maińiiauuanąm [...] ratauuō caṇgraŋhācąm aṣ̌aōnąm aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm] problematic text. Kellens, 1996 pp. 75-76 understands aṣ̌aōnąm aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm is addressing the ratu. As well, a sequence of voc. pl. ratauuō followed by gen. pl. (adj. as sust.). However, cf. VrS2.9, where he understands ratauuō maińiauua... as acc. pl. (sust. + adj.) dependent of āiiese yešti (despite the morpphological irregularities). Besides aṣ̌aōnąm aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm has no parallel in VrS2.9.
caṇgraŋhācąm] Kellens, Hoffmann (apud Kellens, 1974, p. 301). Geldner caŋraŋhācąm. Vid. Hoffmann and Narten, 1989, p. 69, n. 112.
